bibentry.label: abneyjohnson91
bibentry.author: Steven P. Abney and Mark Johnson
bibentry.title: Memory Requirements and Local Ambiguities of Parsing Strategies

paper.summary: This paper describes the effect that different parsing strategies have on memory requirements in parsers, as well as their effects on local ambiguities while parsing.

bibentry.label: miller09naacl
bibentry.author: Tim Miller
bibentry.summary: This is a paper describing some syntactic transforms that allow for more natural representation of unfinished constituents in speech repairs.
bibentry.title: Improved Syntactic Models for Parsing Speech Repair

bibentry.title: Correction of disfluencies in spontaneous speech using a noisy-channel approach
